name: Chocolate Brownie
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Lemon Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

name: Cinnamon Rolls
description: Carefully baked Cinnamon rolls on the perfect spot between sugary and a little spicy, dressed by the purest cream human kind has ever seen.

name: Vanilla Cupcake
description: the classic vanilla cup cake can't be missing in our plates, soft and sweet, made to perfection.

name: Oreo Ice cream cake
description: One of our chefs best choice for desserts and one of our customer's favorite options, with creamy chocolate and very delicious icing with oreo cookies on top.

name: Arroz con leche
description: A traditional dessert, rice and milk, very tasty while hot and cold, day and night, cinnamon powder or not, you won't regret it.
